'''Bedrock Editor v1.0.4''' is a minor release for [[Bedrock Editor]] released in Preview on July 1, 2025, and in retail on August 5, 2025.<ref>{{cite|url=https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/252|title=Release 1.0.4 (1.21.100.23)|website=GitHub|date=July 1, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/255|title=Editor v1.0.4 is now in retail via the Launcher|website=GitHub|date=August 5, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/37741189879821-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-100-23|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.100.23|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=July 1, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added a gizmo to the Entity Summon Tool to allow for more exact placement.
* Added arbitrary rotation for brush shapes.
* Added a new "Pencil" tool that allows to easily add (or remove) individual blocks.
* Added GIFs when hovering tool icons.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug that caused recently used block list of Block Picker to not display correctly.
